text: Cirrhitichthys is a genus of hawkfishes found on tropical reefs in the Indian and western Pacific oceans. ==Species== The currently recognized species in this genus are: * Cirrhitichthys aprinus (G. Cuvier, 1829) (spotted hawkfish) * Cirrhitichthys aureus (Temminck & Schlegel, 1842) (yellow hawkfish) * Cirrhitichthys bleekeri F. Day, 1874 * Cirrhitichthys calliurus Regan, 1905 (spottedtail hawkfish) * Cirrhitichthys falco J. E. Randall, 1963 (dwarf hawkfish) * Cirrhitichthys guichenoti (Sauvage, 1880) * Cirrhitichthys oxycephalus (Bleeker, 1855) (coral hawkfish) * Cirrhitichthys randalli Kotthaus, 1976 ==References== Category:Cirrhitidae
title: Cirrhitichthys
